pullrequest.title: [A-3] Dockerfile and supporting scripts for building ign-gazebo

content.raw:
I think this file can be substituted with  [dependencies_archive.sh](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/src/4f00a7f3e27e141bdff7b1864a91e39dac290132/jenkins-scripts/lib/dependencies_archive.sh?fileviewer=file-view-default#dependencies_archive.sh-717) , it will just need to set the correct variables, something like this?

~~~
wget https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/raw/default/jenkins-scripts/lib/dependencies_archive.sh -O /tmp/dependencies.sh
# I think it may need to set more vars here
GAZEBO_MAJOR_VERSION=dummy ROS_DISTRO=dummy . /tmp/dependencies.sh
echo $IGN_GAZEBO_DEPENDENCIES | tr -d '\\' | xargs sudo apt-get -y install
~~~
content.html:
I think this file can be substituted with dependencies_archive.sh , it will just need to set the correct variables, something like this?

wget https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/raw/default/jenkins-scripts/lib/dependencies_archive.sh -O /tmp/dependencies.sh
# I think it may need to set more vars here
GAZEBO_MAJOR_VERSION=dummy ROS_DISTRO=dummy . /tmp/dependencies.sh
echo $IGN_GAZEBO_DEPENDENCIES | tr -d '\\' | xargs sudo apt-get -y install
